65 class cloudHandler
66 {
67 public:
68  cloudHandler()
69  {
70  pcl_sub = nh.subscribe("pcl_downsampled", 10, &cloudHandler::cloudCB, this);
71  pcl_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("pcl_matched_miro", 1);
72  }
73 
74  void cloudCB(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &input)
75  {
76 
77  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> cloud_in;
78  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> cloud_out;
79  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> cloud_aligned;
80 
81  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 output;
82 
83 
84  pcl::fromROSMsg(input, cloud_in);
85  if (count < 5 ) {
86  cloud_tmp = cloud_in;
87  count = count + 1;
88  }
89 
90  cloud_out=cloud_tmp;
91 
92 
93  pcl::IterativeClosestPoint<pcl::PointXYZRGB, pcl::PointXYZRGB> icp;
94  icp.setInputSource(cloud_in.makeShared());
95  icp.setInputTarget(cloud_out.makeShared());
96 
97  icp.setMaxCorrespondenceDistance(5);
98  icp.setMaximumIterations(100);
99  icp.setTransformationEpsilon (1e-12);
100  icp.setEuclideanFitnessEpsilon(0.1);
101 
102  icp.align(cloud_aligned);
103  cloud_tmp = cloud_out + cloud_aligned;
104 
105  pcl::toROSMsg(cloud_tmp, output);
106  pcl_pub.publish(output);
107 
108 
109  }
110 
111 protected:
112  ros::NodeHandle nh;
113  ros::Subscriber pcl_sub;
114  ros::Publisher pcl_pub;
115 };
